info.author: Boris Pavlovic
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
#Pasteit allows you to share your text with others.


Syntax:

    $ pasteit "Some text that you would like to share"

    $ pasteit some_file

    $ cat some_file | pasteit

As a result it will print URL and copy it to your clipboard.
info.name: pasteit
info.summary: pasteit - do the pastes from CLI
info.html_description:
#Pasteit allows you to share your text with others.

Syntax:

$ pasteit “Some text that you would like to share”

$ pasteit some_file

$ cat some_file | pasteit

As a result it will print URL and copy it to your clipboard.
